nodes.text: Spice sticks were a type of chewable substance made from spice. During the High Republic Era, Byne Guild pilot Leox Gyasi regularly chewed the sticks. At the time, the sticks were legal in Galactic Republic space, but Gyasi, uncertain if they would remain so, laid away a stash in case they were banned in the future. The smoke produced by these sticks had a bitter odor, which the Jedi Knight Orla Jareni found objectionable.
